gw.api.system.server

Class ServerUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.api.system.server.ServerUtil

  • public class ServerUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides access to the current server server info.
    Author:
    dandrews

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getAllRoles()
      This is the set of all roles.
      static java.lang.String getEnv()
      This is the env for this server, this is a configuration control option.
      static GWProduct getProduct()
      This is the product for this server, this is a build artifact for use in logging and determining compatibility.
      static java.lang.String getServerId()
      The server id for this server, this is a configuration control option and this might not be unique.
      static java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getServerRoles()
      This is the set of server roles enabled for this server.
      static ServerVersion getServerVersion()
      This is the ServerVersion for this server, this is a build artifact for use in logging and determining compatibility.
      static java.lang.String getShardId()
      The shard id assigned to this cluster, if any, or the empty string if this cluster is not sharded.
      static java.util.Date systemDateTime()
      Returns system time not affected by time adjustments for testing purposes.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • getServerId

        public static java.lang.String getServerId()
        The server id for this server, this is a configuration control option and this might not be unique.
        Returns:
        the serverId

      • getShardId

        public static java.lang.String getShardId()
        The shard id assigned to this cluster, if any, or the empty string if this cluster is not sharded. This is a configuration option and is permanent once set. Sharded clusters must have unique names.
        Returns:
        the shardId

      • getEnv

        public static java.lang.String getEnv()
        This is the env for this server, this is a configuration control option.
        Returns:
        the env

      • getServerVersion

        public static ServerVersion getServerVersion()
        This is the ServerVersion for this server, this is a build artifact for use in logging and determining compatibility.
        Returns:
        the ServerVersion

      • getProduct

        public static GWProduct getProduct()
        This is the product for this server, this is a build artifact for use in logging and determining compatibility.
        Returns:
        the product

      • getAllRoles

        public static java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getAllRoles()
        This is the set of all roles. There is always at least one role defined.
        Returns:
        the set of roles, never null or the empty set.

      • getServerRoles

        public static java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getServerRoles()
        This is the set of server roles enabled for this server. Never returns null. The empty set means no roles are defined for this server.
        Returns:
        the set of server roles, never null

      • systemDateTime

        public static java.util.Date systemDateTime()
        Returns system time not affected by time adjustments for testing purposes. Use DateUtil.currentDate() unless you know exactly what you are doing.
